sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3170 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(CTRB_SEQN)+1,1) FROM YETA3170 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #ctrbDdcd# , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #ctrbDdcd#, '11')) , #ctrbYrmn# , #ctrbAmnt# , #bfyrDeam# , #detrAmnt# , #dyyrDeam# , #dyyrOtam# , #ayyrNtam# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3170 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn# , CTRB_DDCD=#ctrbDdcd# , CTRB_TYCD=(fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #ctrbDdcd#, '11')) , CTRB_YRMN=#ctrbYrmn# , CTRB_AMNT=#ctrbAmnt# , BFYR_DEAM=#bfyrDeam# , DETR_AMNT=#detrAmnt# , DYYR_DEAM=#dyyrDeam# , DYYR_OTAM=#dyyrOtam# , AYYR_NTAM=#ayyrNtam# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3170 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3170 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3170 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CTRB_SEQN=#ctrbSeqn#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3170 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SETT_GBCD AS settGbcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS settGbcdcommCdNm , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CTRB_DDCD) AS CTRB_DDNM , CTRB_DDCD AS ctrbDdcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CTRB_DDCD) AS ctrbDdcdcommCdNm , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3170 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , CTRB_SEQN , CTRB_DDCD , CTRB_TYCD , CTRB_YRMN , CTRB_AMNT , BFYR_DEAM , DETR_AMNT , DYYR_DEAM , DYYR_OTAM , AYYR_NTAM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3170 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CTRB_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3170 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
